sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, View, Logo, Icon} from '../../atoms' import { Navigation, TextIcon } from '../../molecules' import Link from 'next/link' import './styles.scss' const client = require('contentful').createClient({ space: process.env.SPACE_ID, accessToken: process.env.ACCESS_TOKEN }) const Header = ({direction, items}) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setOpen(!open) console.log("IS OPEN :: ",open) } async function searching(){ const entries = await client.getEntries({ content_type: 'story', 'fields.title[match]': 'driven' }) console.log(entries.items) } return ( ) } export default Header
